_header: I was with pope and cardinal
Subjects: carols, of moral counsel; counsel, moral
_description: Well is he that has enough and can say, ‘Whoa!’ — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Forsothe I hold hym well and withowt woo / That hath ynowgh and can say whoo’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
I was with pope & Cardynall& with lordys
bisshoppis & prestis gret & small…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…He is not here I dare well sayThat hath ynowgh & can say
                    whoExplicit
